title: G minor figured bass - suspension, inv 7th, HC

content.question: Realize the figured bass below in four voices, following traditional eighteenth-century voice-leading procedures. Continue logically from the spacing of the first chord. Do not add embellishments unless indicated by the figured bass. Prepare and resolve the nonharmonic tone as a suspension. On the blank below each chord, write the Roman numeral that appropriately indicates harmonic function.
